entry.title: Forged in Prose
entry.summary:
Author: PhantomBoulevard

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,551Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 19

Summary: “Jason Todd, formerly known as the Red Hood,” Superman says sternly. “You have been found innocent of all charges due to reason of brainwashing and mind tampering. However, you will receive mandatory treatment to remove the taint of the Lazarus Pit and extensive therapies. Considering the source of your healing was the Lazarus Pit, the Justice League wishes to offer you an opportunity. You will receive extensive medical treatment under League Professionals, as long as you agree to an employment contract.”Undercover for the Justice League.Rare Pairings.

entry.title: Dancing with Deceit
entry.summary:
Author: PhantomBoulevard

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,075Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 30

Summary: Jason Todd is recovered from the Lazarus Pit with memories from another life and a myriad of unfathomable abilities. Gabriel should be surprised to find himself reborn as a kid vigilante, but he was not. He’d always been violently leaning and entirely too righteous for others’ peace of mind. Talia al Ghul was expecting a traumatized child she could shape into a murderous pawn for her plans. What she got was a young man too intelligent for her to compete with, too sneaky for her to control, and too powerful to subdue. Ten years after his murder, Jason or Gabriel returns. Mostly written in first-person.  Slow Updates.

entry.title: A Two Body Problem
entry.summary:
Author: redbirdandbluebird23

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,139Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 163

Summary: Jason doesn’t like shifting much these days; now he rivals Bruce in height and size, and is bigger than the rest of the family, he doesn’t often like feeling small. But there are some days where his body doesn’t feel like his own; days where he’s aware of how big he got following the pit, days where his limbs feel too long and he keeps misjudging the distance between himself and other objects. Those days, he wants nothing more than to feel small again. Those days, he shifts.***Jason's selkie skin hasn't aged since his death, not that Dick knows that.

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 288,737Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 860

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more.. . .Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.

entry.title: a grave in the sky (where it's roomy to lie)
entry.summary:
Author: svalas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,093Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 55

Summary: Nightwing stood up, and the expression on his face made Spoiler step back nervously. His hand unfurled, shaking, revealing a sharp and bloody switchblade. Its body was a beautiful red. A phoenix had been carved into the side. “Somebody was here.” If his voice went any tighter it might shatter. “And we were too late.” (Again, he added in his mind. Then he flinched and had to remind himself—not Jason. Jason’s dead. Just the Joker.) or, what might have happened in UTRH if Black Mask was just a bit smarter

entry.title: Nightwing's Robin; Not Batman's
entry.summary:
Author: JessicaLiddia

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,870Chapters: 5/8Kudos: 40

Summary: Richard Grayson, his mother’s Robin, wasn’t a boy who froze. How could he when he was constantly in motion? A pendulum swinging from nest to perch to the arms of his father. It was physics. Fate. An inevitability. Jump, swing, fly, soar, catch, land.Familiar motions that Dick had ingrained into his very soul, the traits that were at the core of Robin, that created Officer Grayson. But in the end he was a bat as well, it was Bruce’s guided hand that created the mind of Detective Grayson, his mistakes that bore the creation of Nightwing - a name Jason wasn’t even supposed to know about.It was still a whisper on the breeze, distant birdsong that Dick had only just begun to hear before the rug had been pulled out from under him. He wondered if the Titans, new and old, knew of this new identity, of this step to independence.-- -- --After revealing the truth about Jericho Dick leaves the Titans (He's sort of forced out, it's a grey area) and he returns alone to Bludhaven. Jason the lost duckling (robin) that he is, follows him.Inspired by the amazing oo2yb's "When the Morning Breaks Us" An absolutely fabulous fic, with a gorgeous premise that I love and cannot recommend enough

entry.title: Cloven Tongues Like as of Fire
entry.summary:
Author: YouHaveForgottenMeAlready

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,075Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 89

Summary: "Stay there," Jason growled. It gave Dick pause and he frowned. What was bothering him, exactly? It hit him suddenly and he wanted to laugh. Jason had given the command in French."Stay?" Dick replied, but he kept it in English, thank you very much. A reminder of where Jason had been while he was away from him—leaving Dick to sleep alone without him—was unwanted."Oh, yes. The view is nice. I've been away too long. Counted the minutes until I could see that ass." Jason swearing in French was titillating somehow.Dick tilted his head to the side."French?" he said. "You're hitting on me in French? You've come back from France and now you're forcing me to remember French?""You speak it, why not?" Jason said.Jason and Dick lead dangerous lives. They make their new relationship work. Somehow. But Jason's life is made more dangerous by his intimate proximity to Death. His time on the other side changed him in troubling, fascinating ways.Dick learns a terrible truth the hard way: the dead can speak. Sometimes, those nearest to them are able to listen. What the dead say could spell disaster for Gotham, and possibly the whole world.

entry.title: False Front
entry.summary:
Author: SavioroftheStars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 120,564Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 297

Summary: Dick Grayson is an undercover agent, tasked with infiltrating the Red Hoods, a dangerous new gang with a strict code of ethics. Posing as Ricky Kelly, a former sex worker with a fabricated past, Dick is sent to gain the trust of their leader, the mysterious and unpredictable Red Hood. As he works his way deeper into the gang, Dick quickly realizes that the Red Hoods are unlike any other criminal organization he’s encountered—disciplined, strategic, and governed by a unique moral code.But things become complicated when Dick finds himself developing feelings for their enigmatic leader and growing closer with the people he was sent to deceive.
